reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Mumbai Slum Community Development Project

description.narrative: The core problem of the project area is unhealthy environment of the slums for its residences. The project holds health trainings for both adults and children and helps slum dwellers to develop their environment, e.g. to get better sanitation. About 300 sp onsorship children continue to benefit through regular Kids clubs and other activities organized by the project. The project goal is to contribute to a better standard of living in the slum for every slum dweller. Project purpose is improved lifestyle of s lum dwellers. The project results in increased health of the slum families and increased ownership of the community committees. The project beneficiaries include sponsored children, youth and women living in the slums.
